content.prompt: Which of the following best describes an argument made by Woloch in the excerpt?

choices.label: The influence of Puritanism determined women’s status in both the Chesapeake and New England regions.
Women gained greater independence in English American colonies.
As a result of their fewer numbers, women in the Chesapeake had a higher economic status than that of women in New England.
Gender roles in the family shaped women’s lives more than the region where they lived.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
